olac-archive.location: 7500 W. Camp Wisdom Rd., Dallas, TX 75236, U.S.A.
olac-archive.synopsis: The Ethnologue data provider gives a metadata record for every language entry in the Web edition of the Ethnologue. The latter provides basic information about each of the 7,000+ modern language of the world (both living and recently extinct).
olac-archive.access: Every resource described by the Ethnologue data provider is a public Web page that may be accessed without restriction. Reuse of material on the site is subject to the Terms of Use that are posted.
